entries.description: Amazon Q: Fixed quick action command list inconsistency between Q tabs
Amazon Q Code Transform: Handle whitespaces in manually entered JAVA_HOME
Amazon Q: Fixed cursor not focuses to prompt input when code is sent to Q Chat
Amazon Q: Fixed newly opening tabs have all quick actions disabled.
Support extended CodeWhisperer session durations when using CodeCatalyst on the same SSO connection
Amazon Q Feature Dev: Use project context from workspace root directory instead of the /src folder
